TEXT.English: Two prominent families are feuding over their children, who eloped together against everybody else's wishes. %s1_civ_adjective leaders are particularly upset that the marriage was held in our %s4_religion_adjective tradition.
TEXT.Chinese: Two prominent families are feuding over their children, who eloped together against everybody else's wishes. %s1_civ_adjective leaders are particularly upset that the marriage was held in our %s4_religion_adjective tradition.

TEXT.English: An industrial heiress from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. The marriage is going forward, but the families on both sides are feuding over which religion should preside over the ceremony. The couple has decided on a %s4_religion_adjective wedding to the great annoyance of the bride's family.
TEXT.Chinese: An industrial heiress from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. The marriage is going forward, but the families on both sides are feuding over which religion should preside over the ceremony. The couple has decided on a %s4_religion_adjective wedding to the great annoyance of the bride's family.

TEXT.English: Sailors have spotted a new population of whales.
TEXT.Chinese: Sailors have spotted a new population of whales.

TEXT.English: Monks from the Monastery in %s2_city have grown their private vinyards large enough for them to become nationally significant.
TEXT.Chinese: Monks from the Monastery in %s2_city have grown their private vinyards large enough for them to become nationally significant.

TEXT.English: Truffles! How delicious. Our people eat richly, do they not?
TEXT.Chinese: Truffles! How delicious. Our people eat richly, do they not?

TEXT.English: The city now lies in ruins. All life has been lost, all property obliterated.
TEXT.Chinese: The city now lies in ruins. All life has been lost, all property obliterated.

TEXT.English: The city has suffered massive loss of life and property. Recovery will take decades.
TEXT.Chinese: The city has suffered massive loss of life and property. Recovery will take decades.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Up to %d1 buildings destroyed in %s2_city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Up to %d1 buildings destroyed in %s2_city

TEXT.English: Heroes of the Sword
TEXT.Chinese: Heroes of the Sword

TEXT.English: Send what aid we can to the survivors. Be thankful that the city itself was not struck.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the eruption
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the eruption

TEXT.English: War Chariots[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariots[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With such a large force of chariots working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.Chinese: With such a large force of chariots working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.

TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.Chinese: Leverage our military advantage into a drive to spread our faith.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Horses will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Classical Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.Chinese: With such a large fleet of warships, additional training for the crews can be achieved.

TEXT.English: Leverage our dominance of the sea to better protect our trade routes.

TEXT.English: We will have to send workers to repair them at a later time.

TEXT.English: Dispatch emergency crews to repair the damage, without heed to cost.

TEXT.English: This will attract more traffic to the oasis? That sounds good.

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered our people. Our rivals have granted no special gifts or attention, though, so our people are merely grumbling and fuming.
TEXT.Chinese: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered our people. Our rivals have granted no special gifts or attention, though, so our people are merely grumbling and fuming.

TEXT.English: A %s1_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from %s2_civ has been honored by a national holiday by our rivals, including outlandish wedding gifts and donations to their religious institutions. This insult against our religious traditions has outraged our populace. Should we declare a holy war upon the unbelievers?

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Low risk of a nuclear meltdown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Radiation leaks may continue.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Nuclear Plants will become obsolete.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Nuclear Plants will become obsolete.

TEXT.English: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.
TEXT.Chinese: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.

TEXT.English: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.
TEXT.Chinese: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
